sql.body: SELECT sssa.id AS 'id', sssa.supplier_id AS 'supplierId', sssa.username AS 'username', sssa.password AS 'password', sssa.apikey AS 'apikey', sssa.sms_channel AS 'smsChannel', sssa.http_send_url AS 'httpSendUrl', sssa.http_status_url AS 'httpStatusUrl', sssa.http_replay_url AS 'httpReplayUrl', sssa.enabled AS 'enabled', sssa.sms_suffix AS 'smsSuffix', <@crud_fixed_select "sssa" /> FROM SMS_SUPPLIER_SUB_ACCOUNT sssa
SELECT ssi.id AS 'id', ssi.supplier_name AS 'name', ssi.enabled AS 'enabled', <@crud_fixed_select "ssi" /> FROM SMS_SUPPLIER_INFO ssi
